TitleEnglish: Takanashi Rikka Kai: Gekijouban Chuunibyou demo koi ga shitai!
SummaryEnglish: The main heroine, she wields a "Wicked Eye" darkness tamed by the power of a pure heart, which she conceals underneath an eye-patch. She is cautious of strangers and she is also rather clumsy, often tripping over and forgetting things.
Aliases: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions! Rikka Version
